raw_comment:
I noticed that for legacy applicants in general you are way more likely to get into a school than someone with non legacy applicants. 

I wondered that if you have more money are you more likely to get accepted into these big colleges because of legacy status. 

This relates to my community because people with not as much money can affect what college you get into. 

Catchy headline= Advantages of having a legacy status
ace_sentences: I noticed something about legacy applicants.
A legacy applicant is more likely to get into a school than a non-legacy applicant.
I wondered about money and acceptance into big colleges.
If a person has more money, then the person may be more likely to be accepted into a big college because of legacy status.
Some people in my community do not have much money.
If a person does not have much money, then the person may be affected in what college the person gets into.
The headline is: Advantages of having a legacy status.
